a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Annual patents filed for renewable energy technologies, World
Data only includes energy source technologies, and excludes technologies such as energy storage or transport.
Figures in recent years are subject to a time lag; submitted patents may not yet be reflected in the data.

g.text: Solar PV and thermal hybridSolar PV and thermal hybrid
